directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
While pasta is cooking, heat olive oil in a deep skillet over medium flame. Add pancetta and sauté until crisp. Reduce heat to low.
In a medium bowl, beat together eggs and grated cheese; set aside.

Add hot, drained pasta to the skillet with pancetta and remove from heat. Quickly pour in egg and cheese mixture, stirring constantly until thickened and creamy (do not scramble the eggs). Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately, garnished with chopped parsley and additional grated cheese if desired.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
